sentences.en: Can anything be predicated about a non - existent thing.
sentences.cn: 能够表述不存在的东西吗?

sentences.en: Everybody else could grow shadowy, almost non - existent to him.
sentences.cn: 在他眼中其他人都可能变成幻影, 几乎不复存在.

sentences.en: Hazards of soybean continous planting are existent key problem of soybean production.
sentences.cn: 大豆重茬造成的危害,一直是大豆生产中的主要问题.

sentences.en: In some cases, the corresponding IT Governance is non-existent or weak, and it is then necessary to do some of the governance work that should have already completed.
sentences.cn: 在某些情况下，相应的 IT 治理是不存在的，或者非常薄弱，那么就有必要进行一些本应该已经完成的治理工作。

sentences.en: Jane began to rebuild her social life which had been non-existent since her marriage.
sentences.cn: 简开始重新建立自己自结婚以来便陷于沉寂的社交生活。

sentences.en: Liquidity, safety and profitability are the existent base of a commercial bank.
sentences.cn: 流动性 、 安全性、盈利性是一家商业银行赖以存在的基础.

sentences.en: Nonwovens have largely evolved from either the pre - existent textile or paper industries.
sentences.cn: 非纺织物主要地是从已存在的纺织工艺或造纸工业发展起来的.

sentences.en: Objective : Inquiry into the existent problem in the natural medicine teaching.
sentences.cn: 目的 探讨天然药物教学中存在的问题.

sentences.en: Only small sums were actually paid out, the winners of the big prizes being non - existent persons.
sentences.cn: 实际付的只是一些末奖,头、二 、 三等奖的得主都是不存在的人.

sentences.en: Tallied up the design finally in the existent problem and characteristicses.
sentences.cn: 最后总结了设计中存在的问题和特点.

sentences.en: The existent condition invariably pleads for itself.
sentences.cn: 目前的处境总会自我开脱的.

sentences.en: The sentence on her is broken, annulled , annihilated, set aside as non - existent, without value or effect.
sentences.cn: 对她的那个判决已经被粉碎了, 废除了,销毁了, 被扔在一边儿,全当毫不存在, 毫无价值,毫无作用.

sentences.en: Their remedy lay within the range of existent technology.
sentences.cn: 他们的治疗方法利用现有技术可以实现。

sentences.en: You are outside history, you are non - existent.'
sentences.cn: 你处在历史之外, 你不存在. ”

sentences.en: You'll take everything you're offered yet your own generosity is virtually non-existent.
sentences.cn: 你倒是来者不拒，照单全收，可你自己实际上却一毛不拔。

存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物
存在；生存；生活；继续存在

trans.tran_en: something that is real and exists
